reviews.review:
Excelente! O jogo em que mais tenho horas, qualidade inigualável, sempre tem novidades, não rola cash for win, é só pela habilidade e trabalho em equipe que se chega à vitória.
Recomendaria 1.000 vezes se fosse possível!
Dota 2 na veia! =D
Fastest way to ruin a friendship, play dota 2 together! 10/10 would rage again

Зачем играть в игру, в которой я не могу пикать любимого героя? 90% игр пудж в бане. Если не в бане, то тупорылая система не даст его пикнуть, так как есть ещё чел во вражеской команде, который не упустит шанс поиграть на нём и нарвётся на бан. Зачем вообще продавать на него дорогущие арканы, если он тупо вырезан из доты?  Я много раз давал ещё 1 шанс этой игре, но когда мне запрещают пикать то что я хочу и навязывают других скучных героев, я просто опускаю руки. Мне неприятно видеть во что превратилась дота. Не знаю, может, после того как система в очередной 15ый раз забанит этого героя я просто ливну из катки и не вернусь больше никогда.
each round with different result. keep it going guys ! good game, well played.

The game as it is--is great. for its an upgraded version of the mod game Dota Allstars. To dota allstars veteran players like me, its a dream come true to perfect our beloved game and modernize it, HOWEVER the toxicity of the community is immense and unbearable, maybe because of the new young players toxic ethics. yes, the community was toxic before but ill tell you its WAY toxic TODAY. Ive spent some years playing league of legends too and ive seen how the community grew more toxic because of young immature players. Dota2 community unfortunately runs toward the same path, as dota1 veteran who plays Dota2 such as me lose faith in the community and lack of humanity. but as of today i still play the game with great passion as if i was playing Dota1 except all my team and enemy team are muted. In out of 50 games, there is only a 1 game where i unmuted my team because they communicate to win and collaborate as a team.  I love the game its a part of me you cant take away every match brings back a lot of good memory so no matter how bad the game is no matter how we clearly lose the game no matter how bad my team i still treat them the best i could i never quit  it never affects me because when i enter the match i become the hero i pick with a goal to win with or without a team to help me, but the community...its a trash more so if you play solo but im not removing the fact that there are humane players among the community.

So piece of advise utilize the mute button and dont get affected by your team and dont quit no matter what, just play the game its amazing master piece.
Dota 2 is Life. Part of my Life. You want to be part of me? < 3
I really love the game just keep up the good update!

The game has a very toxic community. The matchmatching system is a joke and works nothing based on time played or skill base via roles. Some Heroes in the game are poorly out of balance and/or are no fun to play with or against. An example is the Hero "Techies". Some Heroes skills and skill sets change every six months. You can really only enjoy the game once you've placed enough time into it and when you have, everything changes. I got to really enjoy a game once every three games when I started, but now its like one in every ten. I just don't have time to waste on this anymore.
